name: Rights, Responsiblity & The Promise Of Instant Gratification
description:
6 tracks of hi paced punk rock hardcore from the heart of the Peterborough DIY scene.

1. Once Upon A Time We Had A Scene
2. Initonit
3. While We Wept, While We Trembled, While We Danced
4. Republica
5. Armed To The Teeth
6. Let's Lay This Punk To Rest

name: Sea Shepherd 4 Way Split 7"
description:
Happy Days Records brings you this Sea Shepherd benefit 7" featuring 4 great bands from the U.K!!Black Vinyl,500 pressings (hand numbered) with download code and 100% recycled artwork!!But it now and help save the whales...man!!

1.THIS BUISNESS IS CLOSED- "Spitting Teeth"
2.SAMMYS FATAL MISTAKE- "Once Upon A Time We Had A Scene"
3.LEAGUES APART- "I Thought You Meant Wales The Country"
4.ROOFTOPS- "Black Ice"
